Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class RemoteView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.RemoteView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<IServerPacket>
public class RemoteView
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<IServerPacket>
Represents a client view on the server. It is responsible of handling incoming and outgoing messages and updates to the associated client connection.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RemoteView​(SocketClientConnection connection, LobbyController lobbyController)
    Constructs a new RemoteView associated with the given client connection.

  • Method Summary

    Gets the LobbyController that handles this RemoteView.

    Sets the Player associated with this RemoteView.
    void update​(IServerPacket packet)
    Handles an IServerPacket and sends it to the client associated with this RemoteView.

    • RemoteView

      public RemoteView​(SocketClientConnection connection, LobbyController lobbyController)
      Constructs a new RemoteView associated with the given client connection.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection to be associated with this remote view
      lobbyController - the lobby controller that should handle this remote view
